text: Colegio Marista Pio XII (Marist College Pius XII) was founded in 1961 in Ponta Grossa, Brazil, by the Marist Brothers. It covers early childhood through secondary education, and emphasizes learning English throughout the years. ==References== Category:Marist Brothers schools Category:Catholic schools in Brazil Category:Educational institutions established in 1961
title: Colegio Marista Pio XII
